text: @BBCNews It was clear people had travelled from afar to be at the beach in highcliffe and mudeford, dorset yesterday. Lots of holiday homes used by Londoners getting out of dodge. Bog off back to your primary residences you super spreaders! Loads of over 70s were too. #coronavirus
